title: Sions praises. Opened in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen and common council of London: on the day of solemn thanksgiving unto God for his long and gracious preservation of that great city, from pestilence, fire, and other dangers. By Edward Reynolds. D.D.
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: printed by Tho. Newcomb for George Thomason, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Rose and Crown in Pauls Church yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
